full_threads.body: (Time: 20mins) - design implementation + debugging

Hi Haris,

Just a quick update—we’ve now implemented the designs on both poultryhq.com.au and shop.poultryhq.com.au, as planned.

Feel free to take a look and let us know if you'd like any adjustments. Always happy to help!

Please confirm when its live

Kind Regards,
Haris Moutzouris

P: (03) 5926 0729
A: Build2 109-111 Craig Road,
Devon Meadows, Vic, 3978

Hi Haris,

Will do—thanks again for your cooperation throughout this! We’ll go ahead and implement the designs on both of your sites.

In the meantime, if anything else comes up, just give us a shout—always happy to help.

Perfect please go ahead

Kind Regards,
Haris Moutzouris

P: (03) 5926 0729
A: Build2 109-111 Craig Road,
Devon Meadows, Vic, 3978
(Time: 10mins) - Zeph design adjustments

Hello Haris,

Thanks for the clarification, and noted on having the popups appear on both sites.

Attached are the updated designs with the Shop Now button placed above the wording on the same side as the barcode, as requested.

Let us know if this version looks good to you.

Always happy to help!

Hi

I liked the barcode put the shop now button above the wording on the same side.

I did already say to put them on both sites.....

Update as soon as I'm happy with the pop up

Kind Regards,
Haris Moutzouris

P: (03) 5926 0729
A: Build2 109-111 Craig Road,
Devon Meadows, Vic, 3978
(Time: 10mins) Zeph modifies design

Hi again Haris,

Just a quick update—we’ve updated the designs for the Free Delivery and 10% Discount popups (attached). We’ve added the:
  • Line “Delivering the freshest products to your home from Monday to Saturday”
  • Replaced the barcode with the “Shop Now” button you asked for.

Before we put them live, could you please confirm:
  • Should we show the popups on poultryhq.com.au, shop.poultryhq.com.au, or both?
  • For the Shop Now button, should it link to poultryhq.com.au when it appears there, and to shop.poultryhq.com.au when it shows on that site? (Same logic for both—just pointing to the current site.)
  • Is there a day or time that works best for us to make the update?

Really appreciate your help with these final details. Let us know if you'd like any changes or corrections —happy to adjust!

Hi Haris,

Thanks for the update!

Got it on showing one popup first, then the other.

Just wanted to quickly confirm a couple of details to make sure we’re aligned:
  • For the “Shop Now” button on the coupon, should it link to poultryhq.com.au when it appears on that site, and to shop.poultryhq.com.au when it appears there? (Same logic for both—just pointing to the current site.)
  • And just to double-check—are you confirming that you'd like the popups to appear on both poultryhq.com.au and shop.poultryhq.com.au?

Also, when would be the best time for us to implement these on your end? We’re happy to work around what’s most convenient for you.

Looking forward to your thoughts!

Hi

One to appear and then the other and if we could add a shop now onto the coupon that goes onto PoultryHQ.com.au and on shop.poultryhq.com.au to keep it uniform.

Kind Regards,
Haris Moutzouris

P: (03) 5926 0729
A: Build2 109-111 Craig Road,
Devon Meadows, Vic, 3978

Hi Haris,

So glad to hear you liked the designs—and great choice going with the first option for each!

We’ll get started on setting those up. Just a couple of quick things before we proceed:
  • Would you like both popups to appear one after the other (e.g. the first one shows up, and then the second appears after it's closed), or should they appear at the same time? Or would you prefer we decide what works best?
  • Just confirming—should we implement this on poultryhq.com.au or on the shop.poultryhq.com.au site?
  • And finally, is there a particular date or time you'd like us to roll this out? We’re happy to work around what suits you best.

Also, we’ll add the line “Delivering the freshest products to your home from Monday to Saturday” above the barcode on the left side of the coupon, as shown in your reference. All noted!

Looking forward to your thoughts—happy to jump in as soon as we get your go-ahead.

Hi,

Yes I like both 1 options.

On the left of the coupon maybe above the barcode clear this it is from the example I sent.

Just type in delivering the freshest products to your home from Monday to Saturday

Haris
moutzouris

phone

(03) 5926 0729

website

http://www.poultryhq.com.au/

address

Building 2, 109-111 Craig Rd, Devon Meadows, Vic, 3977
(Time: 15mins) - Zeph designing

Hey Haris,

Happy Monday—hope your week’s off to a great start!

Thanks for your feedback. Based on your notes, our designer has put together some revised popup variations:
  • Blue background with the red chicken head for brand consistency
  • Clean white font for clear, on-brand messaging
    Two coupon-style offers, each with 2 design options attached:
    • One for orders over $50
    • One offering 10% off orders over $150

We’ve left out the PoultryHQ branding since it’s already on the site. Just a heads-up—the “lorem ipsum” is just placeholder text. Feel free to send through your preferred copy, or we can remove it altogether.

Let us know what you think—we’re happy to tweak anything further!

Hey Haris,

Thanks so much for the extra detail—and the coupon-style idea is super helpful!

We’ll go ahead and mock up a pop-up that:
  • Uses the blue background with the red chicken head
  • Features clean, white font to keep it legible and on-brand
  • Mimics the look of two coupons—one for orders over $50, and another for 10% off orders over $150

Appreciate you clarifying the direction. We’ll get those updated visuals over to you early next week so you can take a look.

Let us know if there’s anything else you’d like us to factor in!

Hey @andy , happy Saturday! Thanks so much for stepping in and helping us out here—it really means a lot. I’ve noted your feedback about including an example to save time and improve the customer experience, and I’ll make sure to apply that moving forward. I’ve also updated the tag (shop.poultryhq.com.au → poultryhq.com.au ).

Hi,

I'm just looking for a pop up when someone enter the site.

I don't have an example just hoping to make it clear and on brand in terms of colours.

The blue with the red chicken head can be used and have the writing in a white font.
Maybe if it looked like a coupon...
2 coupons could appear on the screen one for all orders above $50 and another one for10% off all orders above $150.

Haris
moutzouris

phone

(03) 5926 0729

website

http://www.poultryhq.com.au/

address

Building 2, 109-111 Craig Rd, Devon Meadows, Vic, 3977

Also - the tag on this ticket is wrong. We should always use the root domain.

So this should be poultryhq.com.au not shop.poultryhq.com.au

Can you please update? Ty

Hi Haris,

Hope you had a good week - jump in here to help.

Two quick questions:
  1. Do have an example of what you're looking for?
  2. Are you looking for a full page banner or a pop-up? I've put some examples below
@adriane + @allieB - please always get an example of what they are looking for first, they saves as time and delivers a better customer experience.

Hey Haris,

Thanks for the honest feedback—we really appreciate it. Sounds like we missed the mark this round, but we hear you on wanting something bolder, simpler, and more aligned with the brand colours.

We’ll revisit the designs with that in mind and aim to send you new concepts by next week.

In the meantime, hope you have a great weekend!
